author: Anthony Spadafora
title: G Suite passes six million paid users, Meet sees huge surge
description: Google's productivity suite is helping users work remotely and stay connected during the global pandemic.
content:
Google has revealed that its G Suite bundle of productivity software had over six million paying customers in March which is up from five million in February of last year.
The search giant's parent company Alphabet also recently disclosed Google Cloud's reve… [+1538 chars]
